website_summaries.verdict: Striking design in a Roman faucet that has a longer faucet than most options.
pros: Oil-rubbed bronze faucet and handles with bronze colored accents give product a sharp look
High arc on the faucet looks great and extends quite a ways into the bathtub
Offers a high water flow rate, which is important for filling a bath fast
cons: More expensive than some others, but ships with everything required

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub faucet
customer_reviews.text: I was semi-forced to go with Delta fixtures in our new construction home. I felt like they were all extremely expensive but this tub faucet looks so nice and feels like high quality. I used pfister courant faucets in the sink bc they look similar to the Delta porter line but were about fifty bucks cheaper per faucet. This tub faucet swivels which is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tub Filler, great price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We replaced all the hardware/fixtures with oil rubbed bronze. Turns out tub fills are not that easy to find with the spread handles. This one is gorgeous, and the price on Amazon was excellent compared to where else I looked.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that’s odd is that the faucet moves. If you have a toddler, you could be watering your bathroom floor if not watching!
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: It great faucet we were looking from time .Price is great we save $100 compare to buy from Store . Water spout is swivel We love it
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad A Saleem

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived used with scratches dings not impressed will return
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product well designed and very well made. installation was a breeze and the finish is top notch
customer_reviews.author: dryck

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Bought the same thing at Home Depot for ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Bought the same thing at Home Depot for $300, this was a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia M

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some washers were broken when unit arrived and had to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: While I only needed (and used) the parts that are ...
customer_reviews.text: While I only needed (and used) the parts that are exposed above the tub surface, the set provided exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis J. James

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Great Price and Beautiful Finish
customer_reviews.text: We were building a home and very shocked at the pricing several of the large hardware stores were charging for the bronze fixtures. We ended up purchasing all of our fixtures off amazon due to both price and ease of returns of there were any issues. This went on our master bathroom tub corner and we could not happier. The online pictures do not give the actual product justice. The bronze finish matches our other bronze products very well. I cannot say the ease of installing because we had a plumber install the fixtures but we are very impressed with the end product. I also purchased thefor the tub as well to match the faucet and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Swivel is very handy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the swivel for our jacuzzi tub so two people can sit in it without whacking the spout. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Tomonthebeach

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this with our cabin bathtub 2 years and love it! It looks brand new and brings a touch of elegance even to a rustic setting. The added bonus is the faucet sticks out enough to be able to fill buckets easily. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our tub
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous faucet for our bathtub. It is much larger than the picture makes it seem. Very heavy and the handles turn smoothly. Overall I'm very happy with it since its looks much nicer and fills our huge jacuzzi bathrub 2x as fast as our previous faucet.
customer_reviews.author: L. Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item. The spout base did not cover hole from previous fixture
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Lee

customer_reviews.title: This faucet has wear and loss of finish from water ...
customer_reviews.text: This faucet has wear and loss of finish from water splashes. Guess I should have dried it off everytime it could have or did get wet. Less than a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelle R Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: $100 cheaper than the local Home Depot / Lowes. Matches all of the other Delta Porter hardware I have.
customer_reviews.author: eldergod0515

product_meta.title: Delta Faucet 37984-OB Porter, Roman Tub trim with Rough, Oil Bronze
product_meta.description:
The graceful arc and simple detailing of the Porter Bath Series recalls the reassuring warmth of the traditional aesthetic. Getting ready in the morning is far from routine when you are surrounded by a bathroom that reflects your personal style.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The graceful arc and simple detailing of the Porter Bath Series recalls the reassuring warmth of the traditional aesthetic. Getting ready in the morning is far from routine when you are surrounded by a bathroom that reflects your personal style.
feature_bullets: Traditional elements inspired by Victorian era flatware
Swivel spout allows for greater utility
